verses.name: Genesis 28:1
verses.text: And Isaac called Jacob, and blessed him, and charged him, and said unto him, Thou shalt not take a wife of the daughters of Canaan.

verses.name: Genesis 28:2
verses.text: Arise, go to Padan–aram, to the house of Bethuel thy mother’s father; and take thee a wife from thence of the daughters of Laban thy mother’s brother.

verses.name: Genesis 28:3
verses.text: And God Almighty bless thee, and make thee fruitful, and multiply thee, that thou mayest be a multitude of people;
